amendment.description: To ensure timely access for Inspectors General to records, documents, and other materials.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3993 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3993 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Johnson to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2966-2969; text: CR S2968) To ensure timely access for Inspectors General to records, documents, and other materials.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3993 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Johnson to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3993 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
